page.title: 14Clubs and Societies.
page.content: This is a list of current Clubs and Societies in our Block;Youth Club, Young Wives,Play Group,Toddler Group, Uley Players,Uley Society,Over Sixties,Womens Institute and The Uley Study Group. The Youth Club caters for children between the ages of 8 to 16. The Young Wives hold meetings regularly and have many organised activities. Playgroup meet twice a week and cater for pre school children. The Toddler Group meet once a week and cater for pre playgroup children. The Womens Institute hold mainly topical lectures once a week. The Uley players are a group who produce pantomimes and plays throughout the year. The Over Sixties Club meet in the village Hall and have many activities.
